name: Five Rooms
description:
Five Rooms is a unique puzzle game that tells the story of a lonely traveler stuck between worlds and time. Five Rooms is passing on different rooms and it gives a promise about enjoyable, hard and hours of gameplay.



As a gamer, you need figure out the rules by your own. Because this game will not give you enough info to figure out this. Only you, rooms and puzzles.
You need to figure out the puzzles and pass through the doors to finish levels. Five Room's gameplay is totally unique and every room has special materials so you need to find them and combine them. Actually it's basic but complicated in a satisfactory manner.

We're targetting a relax gameplay so there are no point, star, leasson, movement, motion counter and in-game purchases or something like these. We have added some tips to make your thinking easier and let you think how to figure out the puzzles.



  • Five different rooms these can push you even make you angry when you try to figure out.
  • Rooms will be able to figure out with your on the mark clicks.
  • Different tricks and puzzles for each room.
  • Useable room materials.
  • Made with Unity5 game engine and it targets a relax gameplay.
